1 // $Id: ContainerMenuItem.js 100 2008-02-26 09:38:02Z bobbicat71 $
  2 
  3 Ext.namespace('Ext.ux.netbox');
  4 
  5 /** Creates a new ContainerMenuItem. 
  6   * @class It extends the base functionality of Ext.menu.Item
  7   * with the possibility of dynamically adding (or removing) a submenu to an item.
  8   * @constructor
  9   * @param {Object} config Configuration options. They are exactly the same config option of Ext.menu.Item
 10   * @extends Ext.menu.Item
 11   */
 12 Ext.ux.netbox.ContainerMenuItem=function(config){
 13   Ext.ux.netbox.ContainerMenuItem.superclass.constructor.call(this,config);
 14 };
 15 
 16 Ext.extend(Ext.ux.netbox.ContainerMenuItem, Ext.menu.Item,/** @scope Ext.ux.netbox.ContainerMenuItem.prototype */
 17 {
 18 
 19   /** This method returns the submenu of this item.
 20     * @return {Ext.menu.Menu} menu The submenu setted for this item
 21     */
 22   getSubMenu : function(){
 23     return this.menu;
 24   },
 25 
 26   /** This method sets the submenu for this item.
 27     * @param {Ext.menu.Menu} menu The submenu setted for this item
 28     */
 29   setSubMenu : function(menu){
 30     this.menu = Ext.menu.MenuMgr.get(menu);
 31     if(this.getEl()){
 32       this.getEl().addClass('x-menu-item-arrow');
 33     }
 34   },
 35 
 36   /** This method removes the submenu for this item.
 37     * @return void
 38     */
 39   removeSubMenu : function(){
 40     this.menu=undefined;
 41     if(this.getEl()){
 42       this.getEl().removeClass('x-menu-item-arrow');
 43     }
 44   }
 45 
 46 });
